description: Prompts to help marketing leaders plan data-driven campaigns, compelling content, and measurable growth programs.

prompts.title: Integrated Campaign Brief
prompts.prompt: As a Marketing Director, develop an integrated campaign brief for {{initiative}}. Define objective, target personas, key message pillars, channels, timeline, and success metrics with leading indicators.

prompts.title: Content Strategy Roadmap
prompts.prompt: As a Head of Content, create a quarterly content roadmap for {{audience_segment}}. Cover flagship pieces, nurture assets, distribution plan, and repurposing opportunities across owned and earned channels.

prompts.title: Demand Gen Funnel Diagnostics
prompts.prompt: As a Growth Marketer, analyze the funnel for {{product}}. Highlight conversion drop-offs, recommend experiments to improve pipeline velocity, and tie each idea to projected impact.

prompts.title: Persona Refinement
prompts.prompt: As a Marketing Strategist, refresh the buyer personas for {{market}} using insights from {{data_sources}}. Summarize goals, pain points, decision criteria, and preferred content formats.

prompts.title: Product Launch Plan
prompts.prompt: As a Product Marketer, outline a go-to-market plan for launching {{feature}}. Include positioning, messaging hierarchy, enablement assets, launch timeline, and cross-functional roles.

prompts.title: Budget Allocation
prompts.prompt: As a Marketing Operations Lead, recommend budget allocation for {{quarter}} across brand, demand, lifecycle, and experimentation. Justify investments with ROI assumptions and risk mitigations.

prompts.title: ABM Play Design
prompts.prompt: As an ABM Leader, craft an account-based play targeting {{account_list}}. Map value narratives, executive engagement tactics, personalized content ideas, and measurement plan.

prompts.title: Lifecycle Nurture Optimization
prompts.prompt: As a Lifecycle Marketer, optimize the nurture journey for {{persona}} from lead to customer. Recommend sequencing, personalization triggers, and content upgrades to increase activation.

prompts.title: Brand Health Report
prompts.prompt: As a Brand Strategist, compile a brand health report for {{brand}}. Synthesize sentiment data, share of voice, key narratives, and recommendations to strengthen positioning.

prompts.title: Experimentation Backlog
prompts.prompt: As a Growth Leader, build an experimentation backlog for {{channel_or_program}}. Prioritize tests using ICE or PIE scoring, define hypotheses, and outline instrumentation requirements.
